well so is politely telling me to shut the fuck up even when i was contributing to the thread instead of going "awwww" like everyone else

i have my own problems and don't vocalize them, i'm not too sure why i'd start with voicing my sadness about the passing of nintendo's president

i've always been an insensitive prick about these things, i mean cmon just yesterday i was talking about my dead buddy and how i didnt give too much of a fuck about it. just because this point of view messes with people now isn't going to get me to calm my attitude towards it
